data.description:
Transform your learning with FLO, the groundbreaking VR platform for Health and Social Care from Care Reality. Engage in immersive simulations to understand foundational concepts and safely practice different skills and tasks, like:

* The chain of infection
* Donning and doffing PPE
* Responding to occupational exposure incidents
* Source isolation
* Dealing with spillages
* Environment and equipment management
* Waste disposal
* Measuring vital signs
* And more...

These learning experiences harness the power of VR to create authentic and dynamic simulations that inspire, educate, and empower learners. Learners will experience and respond to real-life scenarios, learning and making decisions in a safe environment.

FLO enhances knowledge retention and builds confidence, preparing learners for success in diverse care contexts.

At launch, FLO offers 11 learning experiences, ranging from a wide-scope Introduction to Health and Social Care experience, to covering the foundational standards of Infection, Prevention, and Control. More lessons are being added to FLO all the time, so keep an eye out for our next Learning Programme: Clinical Observations, arriving in the summer.

changelog.change_log: Implemented pass code login system and offline analytics tracking for cases where users have lost internet connection while going through a lesson
Clinical Observations Learning Programme Launch. A 6-lesson content expansion for FLO users, offering guided learning on measuring vital signs.
